item.title: Project structure
item.description: You may have already noticed that even the basic cocos2d-x project takes a lot of space on hard drive. The situation was even worse with older versions of framework; it could use almost 1GB for small project. Some people think it’s not that significant, but just weird when you have a lot of projects and suddenly run out of space.
